review.comment: I am always satisfied everytime I stayed here. Always be my first choice everytime I want to have short escape. Pleasant room ambience and hospitality. Highly recommended.
review.name: Maryaman

review.comment: The room was good and quite big. However, we only can get 1 access which is we need to ask the reception downstairs if we wanna go out and they were helping us. Hair dryer did not provide in the room and when we request to have a mineral water it did not provide until we check out.
review.name: Tia

review.comment: All good except you can hear everything that happen on the street. Super noisy. If you wish for a peaceful sleep, you won't get it here unless you're a deep sleeper
review.name: Olive

review.comment: The room is clean and tidy, it has wider room with the same class as other hotels. Hotel Location is quite near from Theme Park.
review.name: Sodikin

review.comment: So comfort and nice hotel to stay. Good food and services. Thanks you.
